title: Fragments, "L'Art d'Aimer (second copy)", early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 24cm [9.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 89cm [35"]  Selvedge to selvedge.
B: Warp: 24cm [9.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 89cm [35"] Selvedge to selvedge.
C. Warp: 24 cm [9.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 89 cm [35"]  Selvedge to  selvedge.
description: Incomplete parts of the same patterns as 1995-50-146, and 147. Fragments contain text :L'AGREABLE LECON and L'ART DE AIMER.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, "L'Art d'Aimer (second copy)", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-148-a/c.
